name: Mitigation Playbook for Scheduled Task Malicious Activity
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving a malicious scheduled task designed to maintain persistence on the affected workstation.

action--f3b9bbf2-b5a4-4b8c-b46f-1c5880d1.name: Delete malicious scheduled task
action--f3b9bbf2-b5a4-4b8c-b46f-1c5880d1.description: Remove the malicious scheduled task named 'UpdateService'.

action--17e56f2d-3f86-4766-a36c-8d35b96b.name: Kill malicious processes
action--17e56f2d-3f86-4766-a36c-8d35b96b.description: Terminate any processes that correspond to the malicious script being executed.

loop--8c57334b-5a6e-4c1e-998e-5291cc241e.name: Scan for additional malicious tasks
loop--8c57334b-5a6e-4c1e-998e-5291cc241e.description: Continuously check for the presence of the malicious scheduled task and review.

action--8c57334b-5a6e-4c1e-998e-5291cc24.name: Review found tasks
action--8c57334b-5a6e-4c1e-998e-5291cc24.description: Log and review any found instances of the scheduled task.
